controls.title: Baseline Governance
controls.description: Establish and maintain a unified governance model covering cybersecurity, data protection, and AI lifecycle oversight.

controls.title: Policy Management
controls.description: Develop, approve, maintain, and communicate policies for cybersecurity, privacy, responsible AI, and data handling.

controls.title: Risk & Compliance Integration
controls.description: Integrate cybersecurity, privacy, and AI risk findings into a unified risk register with tracking and remediation ownership.

controls.title: Training & Awareness
controls.description: Implement ongoing training for cybersecurity, privacy, and AI system risks to ensure organization-wide awareness.

controls.title: Oversight & Monitoring
controls.description: Continuously monitor risks across cybersecurity, data protection, and AI systems to ensure timely corrective action.

controls.title: Incident Preparedness
controls.description: Establish integrated incident response processes for technology, data, and AI-related events.

controls.title: System & Data Inventory
controls.description: Maintain a unified inventory of systems, data assets, third parties, and AI models with ownership and classification.

controls.title: AI Model Lifecycle Management
controls.description: Ensure visibility and control across the AI lifecycle including design, training, evaluation, deployment, and retirement.

controls.title: Security & Privacy Controls
controls.description: Implement baseline security and privacy safeguards across all environments, data types, and AI systems.

controls.title: Vendor & Third-Party Governance
controls.description: Assess, monitor, and govern third-party risks across cybersecurity, privacy, and AI supply chain activities.
